柴.definition: firewood; lean (of meat); thin (of a person)

柴火.definition: plant material used as fuel (firewood, straw, leaves etc)

柴禾.definition: plant material used as fuel (firewood, straw, leaves etc)

柴科夫斯基.definition: Piotr Ilyich Tchaikowsky (1840-1893), Russian composer, composer of 6 symphonies and the opera Eugene Onegin

柴米油鹽.definition: lit. firewood, rice, oil and salt (idiom); fig. life's daily necessities

柴米油鹽醬醋茶.pinyin: chai2 - mi3 - you2 - yan2 - jiang4 - cu4 - cha2
柴米油鹽醬醋茶.definition: lit. firewood, rice, oil, salt, soy sauce, vinegar and tea; fig. life's daily necessities

柴胡.definition: Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense); root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)

柴達木.definition: Tsaidam or Qaidam basin (Mongolian: salt marsh), depression northeast of the Plateau of Tibet, located between the Qilian Shan and the Kunlun Shan at the northern margin of the Tibetan Plateau.

柴達木盆地.definition: Tsaidam or Qaidam basin (Mongolian: salt marsh), depression northeast of the Plateau of Tibet, located between the Qilian Shan and the Kunlun Shan at the northern margin of the Tibetan Plateau.

柴門.definition: lit. woodcutter's family; humble background; poor family background

柴門小戶.definition: woodcutter's cottage (idiom); poor person's hovel; fig. my humble house

柴雞.definition: a variety of free-range chicken, small with furless legs, laying smaller eggs

柴魚片.definition: katsuobushi or dried bonito flakes (paper-thin shavings of preserved skipjack tuna)
